abstract: Update | 4:21 p.m. Shares of General Electric, long considered the archetypal blue-chip stock, tumbled as much as 18 percent on Wednesday amid concerns that the industrial and financial conglomerate might lose its coveted triple-A credit rating.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:21 p.m. Shares of General Electric, long considered the archetypal blue-chip stock, tumbled as much as 18 percent on Wednesday amid concerns that the industrial and financial conglomerate might lose its coveted triple-A credit rating.
